segments.text: How are you , Mr . Stone ? I m Farley .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pleased to meet you , Mr . Farley .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please have a seat . I know our employment officer has already given you information about your employee contract , but I'd like to go over the main details again before signing . First , you'llbe getting a monthly salary , with one month paid vacation after one year of employment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK May I ask whether there is probation ?
segments.speaker: S2
